metadata.title: Average performance of 15-year-olds in sciences (PISA)
metadata.source_and_citation: Source: OECD (2023) – with minor processing by Our World in Data. Indicator: average PISA science score for 15-year-olds (OECD scale; mean=500, SD=100 in base year).
metadata.notes: Scores calibrated to maintain comparability across cycles; see OECD/OWID notes for details.
